titles.title: To liquidate certain U.S. Customs Service duty drawback claims as filed.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/15/2000--Introduced. Mandates the liquidation of specified U.S. Customs Service Drawback claims filed from August 1, 1993, through May 31, 1998.
